TopicTitle: ISA MapSat (or other plant scanning mods) for .90?

Articles.Content:
I've just read about ISA MapSat [here](http://www.pcgamesn.com/indie/five-kerbal-space-program-mods-will-improve-your-life-forever) (and I think Scott Manley's used it before) and it seems pretty good but I can only find .22 releases, which is unfortunate, but I was hoping there are other mods that do roughly the same thing, [here's a link to the ISA MapSat thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/9396-0-22-ISA-MapSat-4-0-Dev-Build), and if you don't wanna go read the thread, here's the basic summary: 

-Automatically scans for artefacts within range which you can show using a toggle.

-KSC\'s are marked on maps, show using toggle.

-Current satellite position marker available on toggle as well.

We got SCANsat for that now: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80369-0-90-SCANsat-v8-1-Real-Scanning-Real-Science-at-Warp-Speed%21-Dec-19](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80369-0-90-SCANsat-v8-1-Real-Scanning-Real-Science-at-Warp-Speed%21-Dec-19)
